TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IssuerNameRegistry extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration
Public MustInherit Class IssuerNameRegistry Implements ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 簽發者名稱登錄的抽象基底類別。

span.span: The abstract base class for an issuer name registry.

summary.span: 簽發者名稱登錄會用來建立助憶名稱與驗證對應簽發者所產生權杖簽章時所需之密碼編譯資料的關聯。

span.span: An issuer name registry is used to associate a mnemonic name to the cryptographic material that is needed to verify the signatures of tokens produced by the corresponding issuer.

summary.span: 簽發者名稱登錄會維護一份簽發者清單，這些都是信賴憑證者 (RP) 應用程式所信任的簽發者。

span.span: The issuer name registry maintains a list of issuers that are trusted by a relying party (RP) application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簽發者名稱登錄用來建立關聯的助憶鍵的名稱，來驗證簽章的相對應的簽發者所產生的語彙基元所需的加密編譯內容。The issuer name registry is used to associate a mnemonic name to the cryptographic material needed to verify signatures of tokens produced by the corresponding issuer. 此名稱然後用來設定或宣告的屬性。This name is then used to set the or the property of a claim. 所公開的方法類別會呼叫從管線會處理語彙基元，安全性權杖處理常式。The methods exposed by the class are called from the pipeline by the security token handler that is processing the token. 權杖簽署的簽發者名稱登錄沒有對應的資料都會被捨棄，不受信任。Tokens signed by material that is not mapped by an issuer name registry are discarded as untrusted. 簽發者名稱登錄所傳回的名稱應該是 RP 應用程式的內容中唯一的。The name returned by the issuer name registry should be unique within the context of an RP application. 程式碼中，您可以指定要使用的設定簽發者名稱登錄屬性。In code, you can specify the issuer name registry to use by setting the property. 在組態檔中，可以指定簽發者名稱登錄藉由指定[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目底下[ <securityTokenHandlerConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md)項目。In a configuration file, the issuer name registry can be specified by specifying the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element under the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md) element. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 提供的實作現成提供的類別：類別。Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) provides an implementation of the class out of the box: the class. 當您使用此實作中您可以受 RP 應用程式組態檔中指定的受信任簽發者清單[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)項目，這是的子項目``項目時該項目會參考.class`type`屬性。When you use this implementation you can specify the list of trusted issuers in the configuration file of the RP application under the [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element, which is a child element of the `` element when the .class is referenced in that element’s `type` attribute. 在下``元素，每個簽發者名稱會對應到應該用來驗證其簽章的 X.509 憑證。Under the `` element, each issuer name is mapped to the X.509 certificate that should be used to verify its signature. 若要建立自訂的簽發者名稱登錄，您必須覆寫方法。To create a custom issuer name registry, you must override the method. 這個方法會傳回指定之安全性權杖的簽發者名稱。This method returns the issuer name for the specified security token. 您可以選擇覆寫方法以提供 hinting 機制時擷取簽發者名稱和方法，如果您想要提供適用於 Windows 的簽發者名稱語彙基元，是不同於。You can optionally override the method to provide a hinting mechanism when retrieving issuer names and the method if you want to provide an issuer name for Windows tokens that is different from . 覆寫方法讓您從組態檔初始化的簽發者名稱登錄。Override the method to enable your issuer name registry to be initialized from a configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼顯示實作類別只接受使用憑證主旨的簽發者"CN = localhost"。The following code shows an implementation of the class that only accepts issuers that use certificates with subject "CN=localhost". > [!WARNING] > 下列程式碼是只供說明。The following code is for illustrative purposes only. 驗證主體名稱為基礎的憑證不是個不錯的做法。Validating certificates based on subject name is not a good practice. 此程式碼不應在生產環境。This code should not be used as is in production. [!code-csharp[WifIssuerNameRegistry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifissuernameregistry/cs/mvcwepapp/trustedissuernameregistry.cs#1)] 以下範例顯示 XML 設定受信任簽發者名稱登錄應用程式所需。The following shows the XML necessary to configure an application with the trusted issuer name registry. ```xml ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回指定的安全性權杖的簽發者名稱。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the issuer name for the specified security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖處理常式正在處理語彙基元所呼叫的處理管線。Called from the processing pipeline by the security token handler that is processing the token. 方法應該傳回 RP 應用程式的內容中的簽發者的唯一名稱。The method should return a unique name for the issuer within the context of the RP application.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string GetIssuerName (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetIssuerName(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken) cil managed
public: abstract System::String ^ GetIssuerName(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ securityToken);
abstract member GetIssuerName : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken -> string

param.name: securityToken
param.span: 要為其傳回發行者名稱的安全性權杖。

span.span: The security token for which to return the issuer name.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回指定的安全性權杖的簽發者名稱。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the name of the issuer of the specified security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作應該傳回非 null 且非空白的字串，以識別可辨識的簽發者或 null 的字串，以識別無法辨識的簽發者。Implementations should return a non-null and non-empty string to identify a recognized issuer, or a null string to identify an unrecognized issuer. 安全性權杖處理常式正在處理語彙基元所呼叫的處理管線。Called from the processing pipeline by the security token handler that is processing the token. 方法應該傳回 RP 應用程式的內容中的簽發者的唯一名稱。The method should return a unique name for the issuer within the context of the RP application. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範簽發者名稱登錄的方法。The following code shows the method for an issuer name registry. 完整範例位於類別概觀主題。The full sample is in the class overview topic. > [!WARNING] > 下列程式碼是只供說明。The following code is for illustrative purposes only. 驗證主體名稱為基礎的憑證不是個不錯的做法。Validating certificates based on subject name is not a good practice. 此程式碼不應在生產環境。This code should not be used as is in production. [!code-csharp[WifIssuerNameRegistry#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifissuernameregistry/cs/mvcwepapp/trustedissuernameregistry.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string GetIssuerName (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken, string requestedIssuerName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetIssuerName(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken, string requestedIssuerName) cil managed
public: virtual System::String ^ GetIssuerName(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ securityToken, System::String ^ requestedIssuerName);
abstract member GetIssuerName : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken * string -> string override this.GetIssuerName : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken * string -> string

param.name: securityToken
param.span: 要為其傳回發行者名稱的安全性權杖。

span.span: The security token for which to return the issuer name.

param.name: requestedIssuerName
param.span: 要在要求中考量的簽發者名稱。

span.span: An issuer name to consider in the request.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回指定的安全性權杖的簽發者名稱。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the name of the issuer of the specified security token.

summary.span: 在決定要傳回之簽發者名稱時可能會考慮指定的簽發者名稱。

span.span: The specified issuer name may be considered in determining the issuer name to return.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會忽略`requestedIssuerName`參數，並直接呼叫方法。The default implementation ignores the `requestedIssuerName` parameter and simply calls the method. 安全性權杖處理常式正在處理語彙基元所呼叫的處理管線。Called from the processing pipeline by the security token handler that is processing the token. 方法應該傳回 RP 應用程式的內容中的簽發者的唯一名稱。The method should return a unique name for the issuer within the context of the RP application.

summary.span: 傳回要用於 Windows 宣告的預設簽發者名稱。

span.span: Returns the default issuer name to be used for Windows claims.

returns.span: Windows 宣告預設簽發者名稱。

span.span: The default issuer name for Windows claims.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會傳回 。The default implementation returns . 安全性權杖處理常式正在處理語彙基元所呼叫的處理管線。Called from the processing pipeline by the security token handler that is processing the token. 方法應該傳回 RP 應用程式的內容中的簽發者的唯一名稱。The method should return a unique name for the issuer within the context of the RP application.

param.name: nodelist

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，從 XML 載入自訂組態。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定基礎結構會呼叫方法。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 呼叫這個方法時，`nodelist`會包含最上層子項目的[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)從組態檔項目。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element from the configuration file. 每一種可能，接著，會包含屬性或子項目，視您為您衍生的類別定義組態結構描述。Each of these may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 預設實作會擲回。The default implementation throws a . 覆寫此方法以啟用您的簽發者名稱登錄從組態檔的初始化衍生類別中。Override this method in your derived class to enable initialization of your issuer name registry from a configuration file.
